value_dict.Resort Hotel: The booking was made for a resort hotel
value_dict.City Hotel: The booking was made for a city hotel

is_canceled.description: Value indicating if the booking was canceled (1) or not (0)

lead_time.description: Number of days that elapsed between the entering date of the booking into the PMS and the arrival date

arrival_date_week_number.description: Week number of year for arrival date

arrival_date_day_of_month.description: Day of the month of arrival date

stays_in_weekend_nights.description: Number of weekend nights (Saturday or Sunday) the guest stayed or booked to stay at the hotel

stays_in_week_nights.description: Number of week nights (Monday to Friday) the guest stayed or booked to stay at the hotel

value_dict.HB: Half Board (breakfast and one other meal – usually dinner)

value_dict.Direct: Bookings made directly with the hotel
value_dict.Online TA: Bookings made through an online Travel Agent
value_dict.Offline TA/TO: Bookings made through an offline Travel Agent/Tour Operator

value_dict.Direct: Bookings made directly without a third party
value_dict.TA/TO: Bookings made through a Travel Agent/Tour Operator
value_dict.GDS: Bookings made through a Global Distribution System (GDS)

is_repeated_guest.description: Value indicating if the booking was from a repeated guest (1) or not (0)

value_dict.0: The guest had not previously booked

previous_cancellations.description: Number of previous bookings that were cancelled by the customer prior to the current booking

previous_bookings_not_canceled.description: Number of previous bookings not cancelled by the customer prior to the current booking

assigned_room_type.description: Code for the type of room assigned to the booking

booking_changes.description: Number of changes/amendments made to the booking from the moment the booking was entered on the PMS until the moment of check-in or cancellation

deposit_type.description: Indication on if the customer made a deposit to guarantee the booking

agent.description: ID of the travel agency that made the booking

company.description: ID of the company/entity that made the booking or responsible for paying the booking

days_in_waiting_list.description: Number of days the booking was in the waiting list before it was confirmed to the customer

value_dict.Transient: When the booking is not part of a group or contract, and is not associated to another transient booking
value_dict.Contract: When the booking has an allotment or other type of contract associated
value_dict.Transient-Party: When the booking is transient, but is associated to at least other transient booking
value_dict.Group: When the booking is associated to a group

adr.description: Average Daily Rate as defined by dividing the sum of all lodging transactions by the total number of staying nights

required_car_parking_spaces.description: Number of car parking spaces required by the customer

total_of_special_requests.description: Number of special requests made by the customer

value_dict.No-Show: The guest did not check-in and did inform the hotel of the reason

reservation_status_date.description: Date at which the last status was set

credit_card.description: Credit card number of the customer

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in hotel booking analysis.

class_value_dict.City Hotel: The booking was made for a city hotel
